author: Tim Higgins
title: GM Ramps Up Testing of Self-Driving Cars, But Still Lags Waymo
text:
General Motors Co. reported progress in the consistency of its autonomous-driving system last year as it sharply increased testing on the roads of California, though it remained well behind the self-driving tech unit of Google-parent Alphabet Inc., according to state records.

GM’s Cruise Automation and Alphabet’s Waymo logged the most test miles on California public roads for their autonomous vehicles in 2017, according to annual reports from companies with testing permits in California that the Department of Motor Vehicles... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
